expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_cleanFolderName
expression_rules.description: Removes special characters from folder name

test_cases.test_name: Folder name with only alpha numerals

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray
expression_rules.description: Removes null values from an array of primitive types or CDTs (for CDT the index must be null, not each field)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationVendor
expression_rules.description: Returns evaluation vendor details based on the given filter set

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_EVALUATION_VENDOR,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          a!flatten(ri!additionalFilters.value),
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!vendorId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId)
    )
  ),
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "vendorId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!vendorId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  aggregation: ri!aggregation
)
data.definition:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(

        {

        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!vendorId),

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria
expression_rules.description: Returns evaluation criteria details based on the given filter set

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_CRITERIA,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Criteria',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!additionalFilters.value),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!logicalExpression),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!aggregation),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!criteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!parentCriteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!criteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!parentCriteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaStatus.refDataId",
      operator: "<>",
      value: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_TEMP,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getTemp = true)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  sort: ri!sort
)
data.definition:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_CRITERIA,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Criteria',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!additionalFilters.value),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!logicalExpression),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!aggregation),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!criteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!parentCriteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!criteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!parentCriteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaStatus.refDataId",
      operator: "<>",
      value: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_TEMP,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getTemp = true)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  sort: ri!sort
)

constants.name: AS_GSS_TOGGLE_EVALUATION_CHIEF_VISIBILITY
constants.description:
Toggles whether or not evaluations have an evaluation chief.  Evaluation chiefs have contracting team level access in many parts of the application, so if you do not want any evaluators with elevated access, then this should be set to FALSE.

NOTE: If this toggle is set to FALSE in your environment, you will not want to place any users in the Evaluation Chairs group, as this groups also has contracting personnel level access and based on this toggle it will add/remove the Evaluation Chair group in the daily nightly process.
called_by: AS GSS Create Word Doc from Template
